Exceptional restaurant that is certainly top of its league~ We had to wait for our table of five, so we went to La Cava for a drink until our server came to retrieve us.  La Pepita was a hot spot!  The atmosphere was hip and relaxed at the same time.  The servers were friendly and patient as we oohaah over the unusual menu.We had the stewed beef cheek which was incredibly tender. The gambas tapa was very flavorful.  You can't go wrong with any of the pepitas either.  Just as we thought the meal couldn't get any better, the ostres...the corn icecream was an amazing surprise. Mmmm...will be back again soon.
